connector.description: Receive data from Azure Service Bus subscribed to Azure Eventgrid reporting events related to a Azure Storage Blob account.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-based-source.topicOrQueueName
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.description: Topic Or Queue Name for the Azure Servicebus instance

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-based-source.connectionString
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.description: Connection String for Azure Servicebus instance

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-based-source.serviceBusReceiveMode
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.description: Sets the receive mode for the receiver.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-based-source.subscriptionName
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.description: Sets the name of the subscription in the topic to listen to. This parameter is mandatory in case of topic.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-based-source.accountName
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.description: The Azure Storage Blob account name.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-based-source.containerName
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.description: The Azure Storage Blob container name.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-based-source.accessKey
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.description: The Azure Storage Blob access key.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-based-source.credentialType
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.description: Determines the credential strategy to adopt.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-based-source.getBlob
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-event-b.description: If getBlob is enabled, then the file created in the container will be get and returned as body, if not only the event will be returned as body.
